title: Cassiopeia tips?
body: It has become increasingly important for a mid laner to learn this super late game powerhouse. Tips? Just general shit.

replies.body: Play defensive, try to hit Q on their champion to get as much stack as u can. When you need to push, Q on 3 creeps then E on each of them to kill them, E give mana back when you kill it with E. Do that for 6 creeps then go help other lane. Use your ult wisely, sometimes you don't need to stun them but u can use it to slow and deal damage. Learn how to positioning yourself in team fight (very important) and learn how to kite with her, she not a brush damage, she is a dps. Build like this {{item:3070}} >>>{{item:3001}} >>>{{item:3003}} >>>{{item:3089}}  or {{item:3285}}  >>>{{item:3157}} (for safe if you winning then forget this is fine) >>>{{item:3116}}  and build {{item:1001}}  to {{item:3020}}  when u can to have more movement speed but if you can go for big item then go for the item first. And learn how to farm and ward mid, she get really weak if the enemy commit to camp her, like 1 game I get top and jungle camp me every 3 mins. And I think that's it. Enjoy her late game damage, 2 E and their adc might disappear.

When your opponent is going to auto (last hit) a minion, use ur Q on them so that they get hit guaranteed since they are in the middle of an auto animation. You don't have to spam E after this, it's just good to keep doing this to build your passive. I like to go {{item:3070}} > {{item:3027}} > {{item:3020}} > {{item:3116}} > {{item:3003}} > {{item:3285}} > {{item:3135}} /{{item:3089}}  

This builds good for kiting and is naturally tanky while still dealing a lot of damage. This is the one I prefer. Make sure you keep poisoning enemy champion to get stronger faster.

> [{quoted}](name=Best Viktor AU,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=A8tz1tBA,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-05-28T05:30:57.799+0000)

You don't have to spam E after this, it's just good to keep doing this to build your passive. > This builds good for kiting and is naturally tanky while still dealing a lot of damage. This is the one I prefer. Make sure you keep poisoning enemy champion to get stronger faster.

I wish I had an extra slot for another item :P
I put a forward slash meaning void staff or rabadons. Whichever suits the situation.

don't pick cass if the enemy team has alot of hard CC, because unlike other mages (brand/lux) who can get off their entire combo before any cc can hit them, Cass really needs those few seconds to get off her crazy dps.

> [{quoted}](name=ShuffledPancake,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=A8tz1tBA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-27T23:15:27.877+0000)
>
> Q+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+Q+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E+E

I believe the correct sequence is 
Thanks man! Think I already knew this one tho hahah

> [{quoted}](name=Olee,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=A8tz1tBA,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-05-27T23:18:03.024+0000)
>
> Thanks man! Think I already knew this one tho hahah

How could you? its an ancient trick lel, Maybe get a teemo top if they have an auto based top/mid laner (op asf)

Just make sure you poison before you E and time it right too. Nothing like having it go on CD after you spammed one too many times. Also, make sure you farm with your E too so you get the mana back, although with this new patch I don't know if it will be as effective as before.

Step 1: Don't play her mid.
Step 2: Q + E + E + E + W + R + E + E + E + E + Q
Step 3: Win.
make sure to hit people with your poison even when farming as your passive stacks are necessary late game and will make you a powerhouse without you noticing.
